Articles.Content: Some of you newcomers may not know about the ksp roleplay. It used to be hosted on these forums, but was shut down and removed because of some flaming that went on. It moved to a different website, and continued there. The reason I am telling you about this is because the RP has just begun again, after the previous RP ending in a nuclear winter! Go to http://play.kerbalroleplay.com/index.php and either think up a corporation, and post it in the Corps IC thread, using Bull Arms Co. as a template, and make a spending tracker in the OOC thread, or make yourself a mighty nation! Apply in this thread http://play.kerbalroleplay.com/index.php?topic=2064, and use the other nations as a guideline! Good luck, and have fun!
Anyone interested in RP can look under the KSP fanworks section, where this thread is posted. We don't need more than one thread about it.
